title: Inside the Parker - Padre Props; Callaway Misconduct Ban; Ozuna Injury Gut Punch -- Jay Crawford on Lindor NY Struggles
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Padre Props; Callaway Misconduct Ban; Ozuna Injury Gut Punch -- Jay Crawford on Lindor NY Struggles
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob gives the Padres props for sitting atop the NL West heading into Memorial Day weekend, discusses former Angels pitching coach Mickey Callaway's ban for sexual misconduct, and the Marcell Ozuna finger injury gut-punch to the Braves. Also, Betting on the Bases, Pocket Protector Stat of the Week, Diamond Dust.

Guest: WKYC Cleveland Sports Anchor and former ESPN Host Jay Crawford discusses the Indians battling for the AL Central lead, and why Cleveland dodged a bullet by letting Francisco Lindor walk.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
